data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Iganga with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Iganga, Uganda
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 17,867 believers in Iganga, Uganda desire the Bible as newborn babies desire milk.
data.verse: Desire God’s pure word as newborn babies desire milk. Then you will grow in your salvation.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Iganga with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 17,867 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Aringa people. 1.5% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Iganga to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Iganga, Uganda.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Iganga, Uganda has a population of 53,900.

We estimate Iganga has 17,867 people who might know Jesus, 26,916 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 9,117 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Iganga, Uganda.

location.name: Iganga
location.people_groups_list: Nyang'i, Kalenjin, Pokot, Plains Bira, Gujarati, Nubian
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Nyang'i (18,000), Kalenjin, Pokot (134,000), Plains Bira (2,000), Gujarati (465,000), Nubian (37,000)
